ygData.subject: Re: Bards and piercing weapons (was  GZ Answers)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Part of the problem is that they screwed up the dragoon dirk when it was first implemented, and as a result there are a huge number of them floating
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 11 Jan 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> What I would like to see is either: 1) some of the rogue only piercing items
> changed to where bards can equip them or 2) more piercing weapons
> (appropriate for 25-35 level characters) added to the game that a bard can
> equip. The counter argument is that bards have a wide variety of 1HS, 1HB
>
> Am I smoking crack here thinking there aren't enough medium level piercing
> weapons in the game for bards to use?

Part of the problem is that they screwed up the dragoon dirk
when it was first implemented, and as a result there are a
huge number of them floating around. If you look at its
damage ratio, it's a L25-35 weapon despite coming from a
L20ish mob.

And yeah, I was miffed that they removed bards from all of the
rogue weapons. I mean some, or even most I could understand.
But all?
